title: ST_DISJOINT | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs:
Returns TRUE if the two GEOGRAPHY objects or the two
GEOMETRY objects are disjoint (i.e. do not share any portion of space). ST_DISJOINT is
equivalent to NOT ST_INTERSECTS(expr1, expr2).
This function does not support using a GeometryCollection or FeatureCollection as input values.
For GEOMETRY objects, the function reports an error if the two input GEOMETRY objects have different SRIDs.
The following examples use the ST_DISJOINT function to determine if two geospatial objects are disjoint:
